angel_description: Good spirit that protects and guides a person throughout his life. Presenting such a gift means to express their concern and indifferent to the fate of the interlocutor.

ask_rating_button_main_0: Let’s improve the FlirtyMania app together.

beer_description: This beer is marked with  special text "Brewed according to the commandment 1516". And its production continue to be regulated by Wilhelm IV law. Bavarians call their beer as "Liquid gold of Bavaria." And every year they celebrate the time of strong beer in Lent and the famous beer festival "Oktoberfest".
bewitched_in_pai: {0} bewitched user {1} into the good little boy {2}
buy_coins_special_offer: Seize the chance to buy coins with 50% discount. The last sale of the year!
camera_not_found: Camera is not found or used in another program
charge_vote: You sent a paid voice for {0} - {1} coins + {2} exp.
christmas_helmet_description: Golden helmet of Alexander of Macedon is an artifact from the famous Soviet film "Gentlemen of Fortune." Every Russian knows the helmet and always will be delighted to receive such a gift.
cinderella_description: Present this shoe to the most beautiful ladies in the video chat. And once upon a time this gift will fit the girl with which you'll happily live like in fairy tale.
connection_from_another_place: Someone from another location has connected to your account
connection_problem: FlirtyMania is an online video chat and requires a network connection.
crescent_description: Even incomplete Moon able to illuminate a soft light and a cool way to the wanderer in the desert of Arabia, and the stars guide the movement towards his destiny.
crown_description: The medal is awarded for outstanding service and the special importance in the life of Flirtymania. This is the recognition of brightest Chat stars who are worthy of the coronation.
denied_access_to_the_camera: You have denied access to the camera or microphone without the broadcast is not possible
den_pobedy_description: A special gift in honor of the anniversary of the victory over Nazi Germany. It is a sign of immense gratitude and respect for the freedom and life of extracted blood and back-breaking labor for the good of the Great Victory.
diadema_description: The headpiece is made of gold and diamonds. It is worn only by ladies of royal blood. To present a diadem means to enhance the beauty and femininity of companion, hinting at her royal lineage.
discount_for_ban_user_from_yours_transla: (50% discount for viewer ban in the its broadcast)
enter_get_confirm: You are logged in, click on the "Start Broadcasting" and accept the user agreement
exp_to_next_lvl: You have {0} experience. {1} remains till the next level
faberge_azov_description: Jewelry gift  to the memory of the Nicholas II  journey to the Russian Far East in 1890 on the cruiser Memory of Azov. The surprise of Faberge egg was the precious miniature of this ship on the aquamarine plate.
faberge_rose_description: The first Easter gift of Emperor Nicholas II to his wife Alexandra Feodorovna. Inside the egg there is yellow rose. It's a symbol of the Empress home city Darmstadt, which she missed so much.
friendship_description: This award is designed to reward the special devotion, selflessness and courage in defending the interests of friends and comrades.
game_is_updating_now: Game is updating now, please try to refresh a page later.
gift_cake_description: Let the delicious gift considerably sweeten festive evening. Present cake to congratulate with b-day, wedding day or any other celebration. Don't forget to wish plenty of cakes and more sweet life to your friend!
gift_perfume_description: Ladies always love to receive perfume as a gift. This exquisite gesture will say a lot to lady about your intentions. The gift can be well supplemented by «Bouquet of red roses» and «Candy».
gift_red_shoes_description: The main weapon of the Heartbreakers and true accessory of indispensable fashionista.
gold_gun_description: It is main attribute of the real gangsters. You can intimidate users or conquer a pair of women's hearts. Even very desperate ladies do not mind to buy it.
go_confirmation_head: Confirmation of the terms of use
guard_i: Flirtymania Medal of the first degree
guard_ii: Flirtymania Medal of the second degree
guard_ii_description: Flirtymania Guardsmen are awarded the Medal of the second degree for showing courage and resourcefulness in chat meet and active protection of their own interests in the general chat.
guard_i_description: Flirtymania Guardsmen are awarded the Medal of the first degree for the well organized broadcasts, after which the audience were dumbfounded by his/her charisma and talent.
guest_account_notice: Some FlirtyMania features are not available for guest account
guitar_description: The true music lovers will appreciate the classic vintage electric guitar . This gift will help to emphasize the common musical tastes with the friend or to express respect for his talent.
knife_description: The authoritative and imperious man will appreciate this magnificent specimen weapon. Such a gift is perfectly expresses respect and brotherly sympathy for the other party.
loner_description: Mark of distinction of lone heroes that did not break under the pressure of female attention, and defended title of Eligible bachelors.
maintain_app_0: Maintain app in Google Play and you will have more new chat buddies! [Maintain!]

maintain_app_2: Maintain app in Google Play and you will have more new chat buddies! [Maintain!]
marriage_description: The highest degree of reward for women for skillful defense and further offensive, that led to the complete defeat of the forces and the hearts of opponents.

need_access_to_camera: What would your coverage to see other members, we need access to your camera and microphone

need_headphones_seconduser_body: Your device doesn't support echo cancellation (AEC), plug in headphones to be heard by other person.

penalty_description: A special mark of distinction for the most experienced and hardened Chat users. It's awarded to the most persistent and brave members that escaped from Penalty captivity and safely returned to service.
pirate_version: Here is a pirate version of the application.
please_sign_in: Sign in to start talking with new friends!
present_exclusive_candy_description: Be sure to share this sweets with your friends in the chat. The more you hand out candy - the more you get happy dating. It's almost a law of the universe.
present_exclusive_deer_description: Fairy-tale deer with an unusual red nose, that became the Santa Claus leader rides . Rudolph is a symbol of the festive Christmas and New Year.
present_exclusive_king_snake_description: This rare type of snake brings its owner huge number of wins and good luck.
present_exclusive_love_teddy_description: This is the giant teddy bear that in life did not fit into the arms of girls.
present_exclusive_vibrator_description: A system or device in which the mechanical vibrations are excited. On the appointment of this toy can only guess.
present_flag_ae: Flag of the United Arab Emirates
present_flag_tw: Flag of the Republic of China
present_heart_of_the_ocean_description: The famous precious necklace from the movie "Titanic" in which the main character Rose posed nude for her beloved artist. Price for a diamond jewelry is so high that only the wealthiest people can afford it.
present_lollipop_description: This bright candy favorite food of our childhood. Generously giving sweets to the audience. And you will certainly find new friends.
promo_main_text: Russian Easter surprise of the Faberge jewelry collection. Eggs rise in price weekly and disappear from the Shop with the advent of the next Faberge egg. This jewelry are ideal gift for collection or investments.
promo_main_text_victory: Have all of the precious and jewelry collection stones, exclusively released to the Gnome Nations birthday!
ring_description: Rare species of red gemstone in the ring speaks of exclusivity and luxury of the decorations. Only truly decent ladies can wear this ring.
ring_i_love_you_description: The inscription on the ring says everything. Give the gift of a pure heart. And your love will answer you in return.
roses_description: A win-win way to seize the heart of a beautiful lady. Especially effectively looks a gift from several bouquets. Such a gesture says about the special generosity and chivalry.
rotate_the_device: In portrait orientation, your video will be broadcast sideways. Rotate the device horizontally.

vip_description: VIP status gives you the right to make private calls hidden from all eyes and ears!
vip_description_air: VIP status (auto-renewable subscription) gives you the right to make private calls hidden from all eyes and ears!
wedding_rings_description: Symbol of love and fidelity. To present "Wedding Ring" is almost to give birth to children and to build a house. A small step, but with a promising future.
whiskey_description: It's the most expensive drink, recognized as national product of Scotland and the UK. Only traditional technologies incorporated by masters in XVIII-XIX centuries are used for its manufacture. Whisky has an unusual flavor and a distinct peaty flavor.

maintain_app_for_exp_faild: You've already received a free experience for the vote.
faberge_bouquet_of_flowers_description: Emperor Nikolai II presented this gift to his wife Alexandra Fedorovna in 1901. The egg is  made in the shape of flower baskets and covered with gold enamel and diamonds. Today, this relic belongs to jewelry collection of Queen Elizabeth II.
report_message: The report on {0} has been sent to the moderators. False reporting may result in suspension/ban.
review_login_text: By continuing, you allow this app to use your information in accordance with their respective Terms of Use and Privacy Policies.
vip_linked_text: VIP Subscriptions use your information in accordance with their respective Terms of Use and Privacy Policies.
buy_coins_special_offer_store: Double coins in honor of the Gnome Nations birthday!
popular_gifts_description: Make the right decision! Here is collection of the most popular Chat gifts.
great_gifts_description: Add some privacy! Only addressee receive «New gift» notification.
wonderful_gifts_description: Be superior to others: Gift message will be displayed in the Main chat.
rare_gifts_description: Let everyone know about your generosity! Gift notification will be displayed in All chat rooms.
maintain_app_for_exp_ios: Rate app in App Store and you will get 1000 experience for free! [Get experience.]
denied_access_to_the_galery: FlirtyMania doese not have access to your photos.
need_access_to_galery: To set new profile photo from photos, we need access to your photos.
need_access_to_push_notification: Do you want to know, when {0} will start broadcast?
denied_access_to_the_camera_for_ava: FlirtyMania doese not have access to your camera.
need_access_to_camera_for_ava: To set new profile photo from camera, we need access to camera.
gems_pearl_description: This stone is rightly called a symbol of longevity and enduring beauty. It helps his master to find a common language with each viewer and protects from «star disease».
gems_ruby_description: «King of Gems» gives an attractiveness for woman and confidence for man. Moreover, it works  as a talisman and protects against injuries and evil intents of enemies.
gems_garnet_description: Since ancient times believed that the Garnet is a lovers stone. To gift Garnet means to declare your love or express gratitude. This stone could rekindle sweetheart's passion and sympathy.
gems_topaz_description: Topaz is universally considered as the stone of friendship, wisdom and spiritual purity. Commonly people give talisman with Topaz to attract good luck, success in their professional career and material wealth.
gems_sapphire_description: Present the mineral as a sign of admiration for innocence and purity of your friend. This Sapphire will give harmony and wisdom to new owner.
gems_amber_description: This gem is a great comforter. It gives relief and hope for a brighter future. Amber increases vitality, develops intuition and saves from the evil eye.
gems_diamond_description: This the most expensive stone in the world is known for its beauty and special magical properties. To give a diamond means to bring success and good luck to his new owner.
share_for_exp: Share with your friends and you will get 1000 experience for free! [Get experience.]
share_for_exp_faild: You have already received a free experience of the share.
share_for_exp_cancel: You have canceled the share action.
faberge_red_cross_description: This gift symbolizes a tribute of respect to activity of Empress Maria Fedorovna in the Red Cross. Due to austerity in the First World War the jewelry egg was low cost and particularly simple in design.
